title: A discussion of the government involvement of digital currency
itunes:title: A discussion of the government involvement of digital currency
description:
George Noory and John Truman Wolfe discuss the possibility of an all digital currency system, it's affect on the banking industry and the government using digital currency to track our individual spending habits.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
